Articles.Content:
Hey guys, thanks for looking at this thread, and this thread will comprise what my stream will consist of.

twitch.tv/nfeld11

GAMES

Mainly KSP-I started a new Sandbox world today and I am currently working on a space station.

Garry's Mod- "Sometimes when I'm bored, I build stuff. THEN MAKE IT EXPLODE!"-Jeb 2014 | Anyways my Gmod will consist of building bases, Roleplay servers, and general messing about. And Jeb's quote.

TF2- Will be played with my friend Jacob, who is complete boss at it.

AND MUCH MUCH MORE!

PEOPLE ON THE STREAM

Jacob-Friend and TF2 addict, will mainly be with him.

Orbitis- Fellow KSP streamer and me and him may combine channels when big enough.

TIMES

Weekends-Usually around 12PM-As long as possible

Weekdays-After EJ_SA's stream ends. If you don't follow him, you should, he's great.

WARNINGS

WARNING! I may talk about politics, I will allow it as long as it stays formal and not "Obama is a stupid (insert curse word here)"

WARNING! I will sometimes, usually when frustrated, carpet bomb the stream with F-Bombs or, anything else.

WARNING! May Internet is bad, and chat lags for me. I will try to fix it if I can.

NOW YOU ARE READY TO WATCH!

Hope you enjoy

Going Live Very Soon

twitch.tv/Nfeld11

Come Watch Me Build A Station!
